movies.Title: A Star Is Born
movies.Plot: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

movies.Title: Alita: Battle Angel
movies.Plot: A deactivated cyborg's revived, but can't remember anything of her past and goes on a quest to find out who she is.

movies.Title: Aquaman
movies.Plot: Arthur Curry, the human-born heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, goes on a quest to prevent a war between the worlds of ocean and land.

movies.Title: Bohemian Rhapsody
movies.Plot: The story of the legendary British rock band Queen and lead singer Freddie Mercury, leading up to their famous performance at Live Aid (1985).

movies.Title: Cold Pursuit
movies.Plot: A grieving snowplow driver seeks out revenge against the drug dealers who killed his son.

movies.Title: Creed II
movies.Plot: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.

movies.Title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
movies.Plot: The second installment of the "Fantastic Beasts" series featuring the adventures of Magizoologist Newt Scamander.

movies.Title: Glass
movies.Plot: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities.

movies.Title: Mary Queen of Scots
movies.Plot: Mary Stuart's (Saoirse Ronan's) attempt to overthrow her cousin Elizabeth I (Margot Robbie), Queen of England, finds her condemned to years of imprisonment before facing execution.

movies.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
